title: Rebirth of MC - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Apocalypse   Awkward Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Cooking   Cultivation   Demons   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Dragons   Fated Lovers   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Lucky Protagonist   Magical Space   Modern Day   Mysterious Past   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Possessive Characters   Post-apocalyptic   Power Couple   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Sharp-tongued Characters   Smart Couple   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Time Skip   Unconditional Love   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: 夕鱼
description:
The MC died during the apocalypse and then he was reborn 1 year before the start of the apocalypse.

He then suddenly opened/found out a heirloom’s secret, he possesses a magical space, a guide book to cultivation, a magical lake and a magical peach tree (immortality peach tree).

His goal is to live a relatively nice life during the apocalypse, hence he started a mad shopping for goods before it began.

But, how in the world did he end up meeting​ such a person?…

ML is A city’s senior officer in the military, his 3 distinctive traits are:
1. Rifle
2. Cigarettes
3. Bastard-like aura 

ML: Wifey, don’t go, as a husband I will treat you right~>
